summary.span: 为用户输入显示一个文本框控件。

span.span: Displays a text box control for user input.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 服务器控件是允许用户输入文本的输入控件。The server control is an input control that lets the user enter text. 默认情况下，控件的 属性设置为 `TextBoxMode.SingleLine`，这将显示单行文本框。By default, the property of the control is set to `TextBoxMode.SingleLine`, which displays a single-line text box. 不过，还可以使用 控件来显示多行文本框或文本框，通过将 属性的值更改为 `TextBoxMode.MultiLine` 或 `TextBoxMode.Password`来屏蔽用户输入。However, you can also use the control to display a multiline text box or a text box that masks user input by changing the value of the property to `TextBoxMode.MultiLine` or `TextBoxMode.Password`, respectively. 使用 属性指定或确定 控件中显示的文本。The text displayed in the control is specified or determined by using the property. 控件包含多个属性，使您可以控制控件的外观。The control contains several properties that allow you to control the appearance of the control. 文本框的显示宽度（以字符为字符）由其 属性确定。The display width of the text box, in characters, is determined by its property. 如果 控件是多行文本框，则显示的行数由 属性确定。If the control is a multiline text box, the number of rows it displays is determined by the property. 若要显示在 控件中换行的文本，请将 属性设置为 "`true`"。To display text that wraps within the control, set the property to `true`. 通过设置几个属性，还可以指定如何在 控件中输入数据。You can also specify how data is entered in the control by setting a few properties. 若要防止修改控件中显示的文本，请将 属性设置为 `true`。To prevent the text displayed in the control from being modified, set the property to `true`. 如果要将用户输入限制为指定数量的字符，请设置 属性。If you want to limit the user input to a specified number of characters, set the property. 有关 实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅 构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. > [!CAUTION] > 此控件可用于接受用户输入，其中可能包括恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to accept user input, which might include malicious client script. 在应用程序中显示可执行脚本、SQL 语句或其他代码之前，请检查从该客户端发送的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. 您可以使用验证控件在显示控件中的输入文本之前验证用户输入。You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control. ASP.NET 提供输入请求验证功能来阻止用户输入中的脚本和 HTML。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护标准控件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178270(v=vs.100))，[如何：通过将 HTML 编码应用到字符串](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/a2a4yykt(v=vs.100))，并[在 ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/7kh55542(v=vs.100))来防范 Web 应用程序中的脚本攻击。For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178270(v=vs.100)), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/a2a4yykt(v=vs.100)), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/7kh55542(v=vs.100)). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 本主题提供了包含源代码的 Visual Studio 网站项目：[下载](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192423)。A Visual Studio Web site project with source code is available to accompany this topic: [Download](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192423). 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 控件获取用户输入。The following code example demonstrates how to use the control to get user input. 当用户单击 "**添加**" 按钮时，将显示在文本框中输入的值的总和。When the user clicks the **Add** button, the sum of the values entered in the text boxes is displayed. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). ```csharp <%@ Page Language="C#" AutoEventWireup="True" %> TextBox Example

TextBox Example

TextBox Example

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为了帮助输入数据，Microsoft Internet Explorer 5 及更高版本以及其他一些浏览器支持一项称为自动完成的功能。To assist with data entry, Microsoft Internet Explorer 5 and later and some other browsers support a feature referred to as AutoComplete. "自动完成" 监视文本框并创建用户输入的值列表。AutoComplete monitors a text box and creates a list of values entered by the user. 用户以后返回文本框时，将显示该列表。When the user returns to the text box at a later time, the list is displayed. 用户只需从此列表中选择值，而无需重新键入以前输入的值。Instead of retyping a previously entered value, the user can simply select the value from this list. 使用 属性可控制 控件的自动完成功能的行为。Use the property to control the behavior of the AutoComplete feature for a control. 枚举用于表示可应用于 属性的值。The enumeration is used to represent the values that you can apply to the property. > [!NOTE] > 并非所有浏览器都支持自动完成功能。Not all browsers support the AutoComplete feature. 查看浏览器以确定兼容性。Check with your browser to determine compatibility. 默认情况下， 控件的 属性设置为 `AutoCompleteType.None`。By default, the property for a control is set to `AutoCompleteType.None`. 通过此设置， 控件与其他 控件共享列表，这些控件在不同页中具有相同的 属性。With this setting, the control shares the list with other controls with the same property across different pages. 您还可以基于类别（而不是 属性）在 控件之间共享列表。You can also share a list between controls based on a category, instead of an property. 将 属性设置为某个类别值（如 `AutoCompleteType.FirstName`、`AutoCompleteType.LastName`等）时，具有相同类别的所有 控件共享同一列表。When you set the property to one of the category values (such as `AutoCompleteType.FirstName`, `AutoCompleteType.LastName`, and so on), all controls with the same category share the same list. 可以通过将 属性设置为 `AutoCompleteType.Disabled`，禁用 控件的自动完成功能。You can disable the AutoComplete feature for a control by setting the property to `AutoCompleteType.Disabled`. 有关配置和启用自动完成功能的详细信息，请参阅浏览器文档。Refer to your browser documentation for details on configuring and enabling the AutoComplete feature. 例如，若要在 Internet Explorer 版本5或更高版本中启用自动完成功能，请从 "**工具**" 菜单中选择 " **Internet 选项**"，然后选择 "**内容**" 选项卡。单击 "**自动完成**" 按钮，查看并修改自动完成功能的各种浏览器选项。For example, to enable the AutoComplete feature in Internet Explorer version 5 or later, select **Internet Options** from the **Tools** menu, and then select the **Content** tab. Click the **AutoComplete** button to view and modify the various browser options for the AutoComplete feature. 有关 Internet Explorer 中的自动完成功能的详细信息，请参阅[MSDN library](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118)中的[使用 HTML 窗体中的自动完成](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=163828)功能。For more information about the AutoComplete feature in Internet Explorer, see [Using AutoComplete in HTML Forms](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=163828) in the [MSDN Library](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118). 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 枚举为 控件指定 "自动完成" 类别。The following code example demonstrates how to use the enumeration to specify the AutoComplete category for a control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[AutoCompleteType#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AutoCompleteType/CS/AutoCompleteTypecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[AutoCompleteType#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AutoCompleteType/VB/AutoCompleteTypevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可以指定在 的控件失去焦点时是否发生自动回发到服务器的情况。Use the property to specify whether an automatic postback to the server will occur when the control loses focus. 在 控件中按 ENTER 键或 TAB 键是更改焦点的最常见方法。Pressing the ENTER or the TAB key while in the control is the most common way to change focus. > [!NOTE] > 如果 控件的父容器包含标记为默认按钮的按钮（例如，如果已设置容器的 或 属性），则不会为响应自动回发而引发默认按钮的 `Click` 事件。If the control's parent container contains a button marked as the default button (for example, if the container's or property is set), the default button's `Click` event is not raised in response to the automatic postback. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性在 控件失去焦点时，自动显示在文本框中输入的值的总和。The following example shows how to use the property to automatically display the sum of the values entered in the text boxes when the control loses focus. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[TextBoxAutoPostBack#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TextBoxAutoPostBack/CS/textboxautopostbackcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TextBoxAutoPostBack#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TextBoxAutoPostBack/VB/textboxautopostbackvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 控件设置为在回发发生时进行验证时，可以使用 属性来确定是否在客户端和服务器上执行验证。Use the property to determine whether validation is performed on both the client and the server when a control is set to validate when a postback occurs. 页验证确定与页上的验证控件关联的输入控件是否全部通过验证控件指定的验证规则。Page validation determines whether the input controls associated with a validation control on the page all pass the validation rules specified by the validation control. 默认情况下，当控件失去焦点时， 控件不会导致页验证。By default, a control does not cause page validation when the control loses focus. 若要将 控件设置为在回发发生时进行验证，请将 属性设置为 `true`，并将 属性设置为 `true`。To set the control to validate when a postback occurs, set the property to `true` and the property to `true`. 当 属性的值设置为 `true`时，还可以使用 属性来指定 控件对其进行验证的验证组的名称。When the value of the property is set to `true`, you can also use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which the control causes validation. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当文本框的内容在向服务器的各次发送过程中发生更改时，将引发 事件。The event is raised when the content of the text box changes between posts to the server. > [!NOTE] > 控件必须在向服务器的各次发送过程中保留一些值才能使此事件正常工作。A control must persist some values between posts to the server for this event to work correctly. 确保为此控件启用了视图状态。Be sure that view state is enabled for this control. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 方法，以便它始终将自定义 服务器控件标记为已修改。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method so that it always marks a custom server control as having been modified. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定是否可以更改 控件的内容。Use the property to specify whether the contents of the control can be changed. 将此属性设置为 `true` 将阻止用户输入值或更改现有值。Setting this property to `true` will prevent users from entering a value or changing the existing value. 请注意， 控件的用户无法更改此属性;只有开发人员可以。Note that the user of the control cannot change this property; only the developer can. > [!IMPORTANT] > 发生回发时，将 属性设置为 `true` 的 控件 值将发送到服务器，但服务器不对只读文本框进行处理。The value of a control with the property set to `true` is sent to the server when a postback occurs, but the server does no processing for a read-only text box. 这可以防止恶意用户更改只读 值。This prevents a malicious user from changing a value that is read-only. 除非由服务器端代码修改，否则 属性的值将保留在回发之间的视图状态中。The value of the property is preserved in the view state between postbacks unless modified by server-side code. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性阻止对 控件中显示的文本进行任何更改。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to prevent any changes to the text displayed in the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). summary.span: 对文本框视图状态在页回发到服务器后所做的更改进行保存。

span.span: Saves the changes to the text box view state since the time the page was posted back to the server.

returns.span: 包含 视图状态更改的 。

span.span: The that contains the changes to the view state.

returns.span: 如果没有与该对象关联的视图状态，此方法将返回 。

span.span: If no view state is associated with the object, this method returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。This method is used primarily by control developers. 视图状态是服务器控件属性的值的累计。View state is the accumulation of the values of a server control's properties. 这些值自动置于服务器控件的 属性中，该属性是 类的实例。These values are automatically placed in the server control's property, which is an instance of the class. 然后，将此属性的值保存到服务器控件生命周期的保存状态阶段之后的字符串对象。This property's value is then persisted to a string object after the save state stage of the server control's life cycle. 有关详细信息，请参阅[IIS 5.0 和6.0 的 ASP.NET 应用程序生命周期概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/de0d8a1c-b1bc-48e1-b246-26e32289a82f)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Application Life Cycle Overview for IIS 5.0 and 6.0](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/de0d8a1c-b1bc-48e1-b246-26e32289a82f). 保存视图状态时，此字符串对象将作为存储在隐藏的 HTML 输入元素中的变量返回给客户端。When view state is saved, this string object is returned to the client as a variable that is stored in a hidden HTML input element. 创作自定义服务器控件时，可以通过重写此方法并修改服务器控件的 `ViewState` 属性来提高效率。When you author custom server controls, you can improve efficiency by overriding this method and modifying your server control's `ViewState` property. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100)).

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性创建自定义文本框。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to create a custom text box. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). summary.span: 获取或设置 控件的文本内容。

span.span: Gets or sets the text content of the control.

value.span: 在 控件中显示的文本。

span.span: The text displayed in the control.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串("")。

span.span: The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用 属性指定或确定 控件中显示的文本。Use the property to specify or determine the text displayed in the control. 若要限制控件接受的字符数，请设置 属性。To limit the number of characters accepted by the control, set the property. 如果要防止修改文本，请设置 属性。If you want to prevent the text from being modified, set the property. 设置此属性后，可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[ASP.NET 全球化和本地化](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Globalization and Localization](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100)). 呈现文本框时，此属性的内容是 HTML 编码的。When the text box is rendered, the contents of this property are HTML-encoded. 例如，如果将此属性设置为 "\ Test\"，则浏览器将以粗体显示 "\ 测试\"，而不是 "Test"。For example, if you set this property to "\Test\", the browser will display "\Test\", not "Test" in bold. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 控件获取用户输入。The following code example demonstrates how to use the control to get user input. 当用户单击 "**添加**" 按钮时，将显示在文本框中输入的值的总和。When the user clicks the **Add** button, the sum of the values entered in the text boxes is displayed. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). ```csharp <%@ Page Language="C#" AutoEventWireup="True" %> TextBox Example

summary.span: 当文本框的内容在向服务器的各次发送过程间更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the content of the text box changes between posts to the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当文本框的内容在向服务器的各次发送过程中发生更改时，将引发 事件。The event is raised when the content of the text box changes between posts to the server. 仅当用户更改文本时才引发事件;如果以编程方式更改文本，则不会引发事件。The event is only raised if the text is changed by the user; the event is not raised if the text is changed programmatically. > [!NOTE] > 控件必须在向服务器的各次发送过程中保留一些值才能使此事件正常工作。A control must persist some values between posts to the server for this event to work correctly. 确保为此控件启用了视图状态。Be sure that view state is enabled for this control. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此事件来响应 控件中的更改。The following example shows how you can use this event to respond to changes in the control. 当 `Text` 属性发生更改时，该代码将在标签中显示 TextBox 控件（称为 Label1）的 属性的内容。The code displays the contents of the property of a TextBox control (called TextBox1) in a label (called Label1) when the `Text` property is changed. Web 窗体页中的用户输入可能包含潜在的恶意客户端脚本。User input in a Web Forms page can include potentially malicious client script. 默认情况下，Web 窗体页验证用户输入不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, the Web Forms page validates that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：通过将 HTML 编码应用于字符串来防范 Web 应用程序中的脚本攻击](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/a2a4yykt(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/a2a4yykt(v=vs.100)). ```vb Protected Sub TextBox1_TextChanged(ByVal sender As Object, _ ByVal e As System.EventArgs) Handles TextBox1.TextChanged Label1.Text = Server.HtmlEncode(TextBox1.Text) End Sub ``` ```csharp protected void TextBox1_TextChanged(object sender, EventArgs e) { Label1.Text = Server.HtmlEncode(TextBox1.Text); } ```

value.span: 枚举值之一。

span.span: One of the enumeration values.

value.span: 默认值是 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定 控件的显示方式。Use the property to specify how a control is displayed. 三个常见选项是单行、多行或密码文本框。Three common options are single-line, multiline, or password text box. 当 控件处于多行模式时，可以通过设置 属性来控制所显示的行数。When the control is in multiline mode, you can control the number of rows displayed by setting the property. 还可以通过设置 "" 属性来指定文本是否应换行。You can also specify whether the text should wrap by setting the property. 如果 控件处于密码模式，则在该控件中输入的所有字符都将被屏蔽。If the control is in password mode, all characters entered in the control are masked. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性指定多行文本框。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a multiline text box. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). summary.span: 获取或设置在 控件回发到服务器时导致验证的控件组。

span.span: Gets or sets the group of controls for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server.

value.span: 在 控件回发到服务器时导致验证的控件组。

span.span: The group of controls for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

span.span: The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用验证组可以将页上的验证控件分配给特定类别。Validation groups allow you to assign validation controls on a page to a specific category. 每个验证组可以独立于页面上的其他验证组进行验证。Each validation group can be validated independently from other validation groups on the page. 使用 属性可指定 控件回发到服务器时所导致验证的验证组的名称。Use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server. 仅当 属性设置为 `true`时，此属性才有效。This property has an effect only when the property is set to `true`. 如果为 属性指定值，则当 控件回发到服务器时，只会验证属于指定组的验证控件。When you specify a value for the property, only the validation controls that are part of the specified group are validated when the control posts back to the server. 如果未指定此属性的值，并且 属性设置为 `true`，则当控件回发到服务器时，将验证该页上未分配给验证组的所有验证控件。If you do not specify a value for this property and the property is set to `true`, all validation controls on the page that are not assigned to a validation group are validated when the control posts back to the server. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定在文本到达控件末尾时，多行 控件中显示的文本是否自动在下一行上继续。Use the property to specify whether the text displayed in a multiline control automatically continues on the next line when the text reaches the end of the control. > [!NOTE] > 仅当 属性设置为 `TextBoxMode.MultiLine`时，此属性才适用。This property is applicable only when the property is set to `TextBoxMode.MultiLine`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来包装 控件中输入的文本。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to wrap text entered in the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)).
